name: Sinew
description:
Sinew is a surrealist game that focuses on narrative through strange images and scenarios inspired by the La La Land games made by Matt Aldridge. Everything in the game was made by me. The game has four unique endings and takes around 40 minutes to an hour to play through entirely. 

Controls: A/D for movement, E to interact, ESC to instantly quit the game.
Soundtrack
Tools: Gamemaker Studio,  Audacity,  MuseScore 2.

Thanks for playing.
